meta.content: The Seacoast Charter School is a publicly funded elementary and middle school uniquely focused on experiencing education through the arts.

strong.em: SCS families, please check your email for continued updates and details about remote learning during our temporary campus closure starting March 16.

div.p: Message from our school counselor, Dani Rooney, with some helpful information for students and parents!
Board of Trustees meeting: April 28, 6 pm
